com.vectorprint.report.running

Class ReportRunner<RD extends ReportDataHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vectorprint.report.running.ReportRunner<RD>
  • Type Parameters:
    RD - the type of data for the Runner
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReportBuilder<String[],RD>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreadSafeReportBuilder

    public class ReportRunner<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
extends Object
implements ReportBuilder<String[],RD>
    This implementation does not depend on iText and may be subclassed to generate reports of other tastes. It overrides ReportBuilder with String[] for arguments.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int buildReport(String[] args)
      Calls buildReport(java.lang.String[], java.io.OutputStream), uses the setting OUTPUT.
      int buildReport(String[] args, OutputStream out)
      Bottleneck method, writes report to stream argument, calls BaseReportGenerator.generate(com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder, java.io.OutputStream).
      static int findSettingsAndBuild()
      looks for CONFIG_FILE in the working directory or in the classpath (ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String)), when found creates VectorPrintProperties and calls buildReport(java.lang.String[]).
      DataCollector<RD> getDataCollector()
      Instantiates a datacollector based on a property #DATACLASS
      ReportGenerator<RD> getReportGenerator()
      Instantiates a report generator based on a property #REPORTCLASS, defaults to BaseReportGenerator
      com.vectorprint.configuration.EnhancedMap getSettings() 
      static void main(String[] args)
      if the first argument is a file, this file is assumed to be the settings file, otherwise settings are searched using CONFIG_FILE.
      protected void showHelp(com.vectorprint.configuration.EnhancedMap properties)
      called when a setting #HELP is present, calls Help.printHelp(java.io.PrintStream) and EnhancedMap.printHelp().

      • getSettings

        public com.vectorprint.configuration.EnhancedMap getSettings()

      • findSettingsAndBuild

        public static int findSettingsAndBuild()
                                throws Exception
        looks for CONFIG_FILE in the working directory or in the classpath (ClassLoader.getResourceAsStream(java.lang.String)), when found creates VectorPrintProperties and calls buildReport(java.lang.String[]).
        Returns:
        EXITNOSETTINGS when no config found
        Throws:
        Exception

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws Exception
        if the first argument is a file, this file is assumed to be the settings file, otherwise settings are searched using CONFIG_FILE. When no settings are found help will be printed to standard out.
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        Exception

      • buildReport

        public int buildReport(String[] args,
              OutputStream out)
                throws Exception
        Bottleneck method, writes report to stream argument, calls BaseReportGenerator.generate(com.vectorprint.report.data.ReportDataHolder, java.io.OutputStream).
        Specified by:
        buildReport in interface ReportBuilder<String[],RD extends ReportDataHolder>
        Parameters:
        args -
        out -

        Exception
        See Also:
